attributes.action: Replace our union flag on belfast city hall 365 days a year
attributes.additional_details: Sadly on 3/12/12 the union flag was voted by the republican alliance party & sinn fein ira terrorists to be removed from belfast city hall a government building in northern ireland the flag off our kingdom that our forefathers died for these republicans our wanting to destroy anything british in northern ireland this flag the union jack has been flown from the city hall for over 100 years we the under signed would like to see it replaced in its rightful place 365 days off the year thanks
